Staten Island is experiencing a surge in flu cases, dubbed the 'super flu,' while a carbon monoxide leak in Queens has sickened ten individuals; additionally, New York's Attorney General warns against price gouging amid a winter storm.

### Risks & Alerts

- Staten Island flu cases surge as ‘super flu’ impacts New York; residents advised to get vaccinated. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Ten people hospitalized due to carbon monoxide leak in Queens; residents urged to check detectors.
